author: smuzaffar
body:
In CLANG_X IB (which has llvm21), we get warnings like [a]. This change explicitly creates the `std::string` to hold the object and then use `object.c_str()` where needed.


[a] https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/buildlogs/el8_amd64_gcc13/CMSSW_16_0_CLANG_X_2025-10-28-2300/CondCore/HcalPlugins
```
In file included from src/CondCore/HcalPlugins/plugins/HcalChannelQuality_PayloadInspector.cc:9:
  [src/CondCore/HcalPlugins/interface/HcalObjRepresent.h:98](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_16_0_CLANG_X_2025-10-28-2300/CondCore/HcalPlugins/interface/HcalObjRepresent.h#L98):27: warning: object backing the pointer 'histLabel' will be destroyed at the end of the full-expression [-Wdangling-assignment-gsl]
    98 |               histLabel = ("run" + std::to_string(run_) + "_" + subDetName + "_d" + std::to_string(depth)).c_str();
  [src/CondCore/HcalPlugins/interface/HcalObjRepresent.h:332](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_16_0_CLANG_X_2025-10-28-2300/CondCore/HcalPlugins/interface/HcalObjRepresent.h#L332):21: warning: object backing the pointer 'newName' will be destroyed at the end of the full-expression [-Wdangling-assignment-gsl]
   332 |           newName = ("run_" + std::to_string(run_) + "_" + subDetName + "_d" + std::to_string(i) + "_" +
  333 |                      (plotForm == "EtaProfile" ? "ieta" : "iphi"))
```
title: HcalObjRepresent: Fix for destroyed point after the full-expression
